results.name: a(n) = A003961(n) - 2*n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[Times @@ Map[#1^#2 & @@ # &, FactorInteger[n] /. {p_, e_} /; e > 0 :> {Prime[PrimePi@ p + 1], e}] - Boole[n == 1] - 2 n, {n, 78}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 14 2017 *)
xref: Cf. A246282 (positions of the positive terms), A252742 (their characteristic function).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 21 2014
